short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable signing in to Georgia Tech from the Udacity signin page, and warn about logout when GATech credentials expire.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For OMSCS students.

- Detects when Georgia Tech has signed you out and show warning
- Enable signing in to Georgia Tech using the normal Udacity Signin button
- Make it more obvious how to signin on the /georgia-tech/welcome page
